header.title: Jesktop Documentation
header.subtitle: Contributors
header.notice: Jesktop documentation is under construction. Everything you can find outside this page is to be considered obsolete.

s1.title: List of contributors
s1.p: William Beebe bill_beebe@yahoo.com. Creator of Portable Java Environment (PJE) which is the parent project of Jesktop. Co-creator of Jesktop. Design, documentation, and structure of Jesktop.
Paul Hammant Paul_Hammant@yahoo.com. Contributor to PJE. Co-creator of Jesktop including prototype work. Design, documentation, and structure of Jesktop.
Laurent Cornelis lcor@brutele.be. Development of Mime registry and Mime/associations tool.
Rana Bhattacharyya rana_b@yahoo.com. Development of Jar Utility and donator of it to the Jesktop project. Thanks :-)
Mark Stang markstang@earthlink.net. Contributions to build scripts so far.
